details.text: Platform interface logic.
Global interconnect for 5 global loads and 2 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 5 global loads and 2 global stores.
See %L for more information

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.
Contains information for the host.

Additional information.text: Requested size 4096 bytes, implemented size 20480 bytes, stall-free, 1 read and 1 write.
For each replicate, 5 private copies were created to enable simultaneous execution of 5 loop iterations defined at  (%L)
You can reduce the number of copies of this memory by limiting the concurrency of its loop; see the OpenCL Programming Guide for details.
Banked on bits 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 into 32 separate banks.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.
